messages.content:
My love, my
dearest Amy.
It has been more
than a year since I
have known you.
This time last year
I would be home
from a debate in
Kosice, and I would
be thinking about
you, us, what it
means and quietly
wonder what I
started. We made
plans to meet and
together figured out
ways to meet though
the whole republic.
I started one of
the best and most
interesting times
of my life, talking
to you, getting to
know you and myself.
I had learned a great
deal about myself.
The more I talked
to you the more
I realized how much
I loved you, and that
I am never going
to give up you and
also us. Thank you
for being in my life.
You mean the world
to me, you ARE my world.
I love you bye <3
